DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect neurocognitive enhancement cognitive ability relate social adaptive behaviour individual diagnose major depressive disorder . Subjects study randomize receive Neurocognitive Enhancement Therapy ( NET ) wait list NET . Secondary aim include examine whether cognitive benefit potentiate repeated exposure in-home practice complementary exercise . Additionally , investigator examine durability effect generalization functional capacity everyday functional performance completion group .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male Female . 2 . Subjects age 18 65 , age range available normative comparison data . 1 . Presence medical diagnosis associate know cognitive impairment , multiple sclerosis , cerebrovascular accident , dementia , history traumatic brain injury . 2 . Subjects read level grade 6 , assess Wide Range Achievement Test Reading Recognition Subtest , exclude likelihood understand task instruction . 3 . Subjects uncorrectable vision hearing impairment would preclude valid assessment intervention procedure .
